text: Miss BG is a 2005-08 Canadian/French childrens animated educational television series co-produced by Marblemedia (Canada) and Ellipsanime (France) in association with TVO (Canada) TFO (Canada) and France 5 (France) Category:2008 Canadian television series endings Category:2000s children's television series The Theme song is sung by Tajja Isen.
title: Miss BG
